channel.title: The Alien Dark - LV426 (off-calendar one-shot)
channel.description:
A group of colonists on Archeron (LV-426) are away from the colony when a crisis takes hold and return to find ... [CONTENT WARNING] ... Body Horror ... The session is set in the interval between the colony going dark and the arrival of the USS Sulaco at the start of the Aliens movie and uses my hack of Cthulhu Dark (by Graham Walmsley) and is scaffolded by the new Alien Cinematic RPG from Free League Publishing. A former Colonial Marine (@Ferret), forced from the Corps, re-discoveres her mojo; a scarred former Medic (@Puckett) is determined to put her past behind her but must instead confront it; a Scientist (@erez87), determined that Humanity should make the Frontier bloom, discovers life is not so simple (and much more horrific) than he had believed; and a Weland-Yutani Corporate on the slide (@Will_H) sees an opportunity to resurrect his career ... wait for the epilogues ...
